about_the_game:
DlodloVR Player Video Player

DlodloVR Player provides you a way to enjoy a journey traveling around the world. Support to play 4K HD video, all major video formats, and major VR hardware. Create a dedicated VR world for you, with customized experience mode. Bring you into a new horizon.

Every frame is wonderful

3D, 360 video provides a strong sense of immersion, allowing users to enjoy the immersive movie viewing experience. Once you choose a video, you can take standard playback control comfortably. In addition, you can adjust the size of the screen (CTRL + A, CTRL + S), arc-screen degree(CTRL + D, CTRL + F), the screen up and down position (CTRL + G, CTRL + H), restore default settings (CTRL + R), and set the zero pose for the seated tracker coordinate system to the current position and yaw of the HMD(Z). According to customer preferences to adjust the most comfortable Viewing angle. 360 panorama video using the panorama playback mode, so that every frame in front of you to show the most extreme sensory experience.

Key Features

Support HTC Vive and OpenVR head use.
Support keyboad and mouse.
Support 2D, 3D, 360°. Over up and down, left and right videos.
Support local video list display.
Support one button to play with URL address .
Play screen size adjustment.

Video Format Support

.mp4, .m4v, .mp4v, .3g2, .3gp2, .3gp, .3gpp, .mpg, .mpeg, .m1v, .mp2, .mp3, .mpa, .mpe, .m3u, .asf, .wma , .wmv, .wm, .asx, .wax, .wvx, .wmx, .avi, .ivf, .mov
